tours.question: How can I discover tours?
tours.answer: You can discover all tours in North Cyprus using the categories on the home page or the search feature. You can also see nearby tours on the map view.

favorites.question: How do I add to favorites?
favorites.answer: Tap the heart icon on a tour detail page to add it to your favorites. You can access your favorites from the bottom menu.

directions.question: How do I get to a tour location?
directions.answer: Tap the "Get Directions" button on the tour detail page to get directions via your map app.

membership.question: What are the membership benefits?
membership.answer: With Gold and Business memberships, you can enjoy exclusive discounts, early access, and VIP tours.

contact.removalRequestInfo: Did you see a place that doesn't want to be listed? Thank you for your support. You can create a support ticket right now to have the venue/area removed from the list.

faq.a1: You can discover all tours in North Cyprus using the categories on the home page or the search feature. You can also see nearby tours on the map view.
faq.q2: How can I upgrade my membership?
faq.a2: Go to your profile and open the "Membership Card" section to explore Gold or Business membership options.
faq.q3: How do I add tours to favorites?
faq.a3: Tap the heart icon on a tour detail page to add it to favorites. Access favorites from the bottom tab.
faq.a4: You can manage your notification preferences from the Settings page. Stay informed about new tours and recommendations.
faq.q5: How can I delete my account?
faq.a5: Reach our support team from the Contact page. Account deletion removes all data permanently.
faq.q6: How do I get to a tour location?
faq.a6: Tap the "Get Directions" button on the tour detail page to get directions via your map app.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.intro: Please read these terms carefully before using Cyprigo.
termsOfUse.note: By continuing to use Cyprigo, you agree to these terms.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance
sections.content:
By downloading, installing, or using the Cyprigo mobile application (the "App"), you agree to these Terms of Use (the "Terms"). If you do not agree, please do not use the App.

You must be at least 13 years old to use the App. If you are under 18, you may use the App only with the consent and supervision of a parent or legal guardian.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
sections.content:
Cyprigo is a mobile application that helps you discover tourist places, historical sites, and tours in Northern Cyprus.

Services we provide:
â€¢ Detailed information about places and tours
â€¢ Location-based recommendations and discovery
â€¢ Saving favorites
â€¢ Map viewing and directions
â€¢ Personalized recommendations
â€¢ Community posts

Important: Cyprigo is an information and discovery platform. We do not process tour bookings or payments directly.

sections.title: 3. User Account
sections.content:
Account creation:
â€¢ You must provide accurate and up-to-date information
â€¢ You are responsible for keeping your account credentials confidential
â€¢ You are responsible for all activity under your account

Account security:
â€¢ Do not share your password with anyone
â€¢ Notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access
â€¢ We recommend using a strong and unique password

You may delete your account at any time from Settings > Delete Account.

sections.title: 4. In-App Purchases
sections.content:
Cyprigo may offer premium membership options.

Payment terms:
â€¢ All purchases are processed via Apple App Store
â€¢ Prices are shown in your local currency
â€¢ Payment is charged to your Apple account upon confirmation

Subscription terms:
â€¢ Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of the period
â€¢ Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current period
â€¢ To cancel, use iOS Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions

Refund policy:
â€¢ All refunds are subject to Appleâ€™s policies
â€¢ For refund requests, contact Apple Support

sections.title: 5. User Responsibilities
sections.content:
When using the App, you must follow these rules:

Acceptable use:
â€¢ Provide accurate and up-to-date information
â€¢ Comply with applicable laws and regulations
â€¢ Treat other users respectfully
â€¢ Follow community guidelines

Prohibited use:
â€¢ Using the App for illegal purposes
â€¢ Distributing malware or compromising system security
â€¢ Attempting unauthorized access to other accounts
â€¢ Reverse engineering or attempting to extract source code
â€¢ Sharing spam, misleading, or inappropriate content
â€¢ Harassing or disturbing other users

sections.title: 6. Community & User-Generated Content
sections.content:
Cyprigo includes community features where users can post content. To keep the community safe, the following rules apply:

Zero tolerance:
â€¢ No objectionable content (including harassment, hate speech, explicit content, spam, or misinformation)
â€¢ No abusive behavior toward other users

Reporting & blocking:
â€¢ You can report content in the app
â€¢ You can block abusive users, which hides their content from your feed

Enforcement:
â€¢ We may remove content and restrict, suspend, or terminate accounts for violations
â€¢ We review reports and take action as quickly as possible, typically within 24 hours

For urgent safety concerns, contact: cyprurigo@gmail.com

sections.title: 7. Intellectual Property
sections.content:
All Cyprigo content, design, logo, graphics, text, and software are protected by copyright and intellectual property laws.

License:
We grant you a limited, revocable, non-transferable, non-exclusive license to use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes.

Not permitted:
â€¢ Copying, reproducing, or distributing content without permission
â€¢ Commercial use
â€¢ Reverse engineering or source code extraction attempts
â€¢ Unauthorized use of trademarks, logos, or other IP

sections.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
sections.content:
The App is provided "as is" and "as available". To the maximum extent permitted by law:

â€¢ We do not guarantee uninterrupted, error-free, or secure operation
â€¢ We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of information
â€¢ We are not responsible for third-party servicesâ€™ content or availability
â€¢ We are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages

Your use of the App is at your own risk.

sections.title: 9. Account Termination
sections.content:
Deleting your account:
You may delete your account at any time from Settings > Delete Account. Account deletion is irreversible.

Our rights:
We may suspend or permanently terminate your account without prior notice if:
â€¢ You violate these Terms
â€¢ You engage in illegal activities
â€¢ You harm or harass other users
â€¢ You misuse the App

In case of termination, active subscriptions remain valid until the end of the current period.

sections.title: 10. Changes
sections.content:
We reserve the right to update these Terms at any time.

Change notice:
â€¢ Material changes may be announced in-app
â€¢ Updated terms will be published in the App
â€¢ The "last updated" date will be revised

Continuing to use the App after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

sections.title: 11. Governing Law
sections.content:
These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus.

Dispute resolution:
â€¢ We will first seek an amicable resolution
â€¢ If unresolved, mediation may be pursued
â€¢ TRNC courts have exclusive jurisdiction

sections.title: 12. Contact
sections.content:
If you have questions, suggestions, or complaints about these Terms, contact us:

Email: cyprurigo@gmail.com

Cyprigo
Northern Cyprus

Last updated: December 2025

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Please read this privacy policy carefully before using Cyprigo.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content:
At Cyprigo ("we", "us", or the "App"), we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it when you use the Cyprigo mobile application.

By downloading, installing, or using this App, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content:
Cyprigo may collect the following information:

(a) Account information: Name, email address, and profile photo you provide during registration.

(b) Location data: Your device location to show nearby attractions and tours (only with your explicit permission and while the app is in use).

(c) Usage data: In-app interactions, viewed tours, favorites, and preferences.

(d) Device information: Device model, OS version, and app version (for debugging and performance improvements).

(e) Purchase information: Membership status (payment details are processed and stored by Apple; we do not have access to your payment details).

sections.title: 3. Community & Safety Data (User-Generated Content)
sections.content:
When you use community features, we may process additional data to prevent abuse and moderate user-generated content:

â€¢ Reports: report reason, optional description, and references to the reported content
â€¢ Blocking: records of users you block so their content is hidden from your feed
â€¢ Moderation actions: status updates when content is reviewed and action is taken

This data helps us enforce our zero-tolerance policy and respond to safety concerns.

sections.title: 4. How We Use Information
sections.content:
We use the collected information to:

â€¢ Provide information about tourist places and tours in Northern Cyprus
â€¢ Offer location-based recommendations and a personalized experience
â€¢ Manage and secure your account
â€¢ Analyze and improve app performance
â€¢ Provide customer support
â€¢ Comply with legal obligations

Important: Cyprigo is an information and discovery app. We do not process reservations or payments directly.

sections.title: 5. Sharing of Information
sections.content:
We do not share your personal data with third parties except in the following cases:

(a) Service providers: Trusted providers for app infrastructure (e.g., Supabase for database services).

(b) Legal requirements: When required by law or in response to legal processes.

(c) Business transfers: In case of a merger, sale, or transfer of company assets.

We never sell or rent your personal data to third parties for advertising or marketing purposes.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content:
We apply industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

â€¢ Secure data transfer with SSL/TLS encryption
â€¢ Secure cloud server infrastructure
â€¢ Access control and authorization mechanisms
â€¢ Encrypted data storage
â€¢ Regular security assessments

While no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure, we take commercially reasonable measures to protect your information.

sections.title: 7. Data Retention
sections.content:
We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy:

â€¢ Account information: While your account remains active
â€¢ Usage data: Up to 24 months
â€¢ Location data: Processed in real time and not stored permanently

When you delete your account, your personal data will be permanently removed from our systems within 30 days (except where legal retention requirements apply).

sections.title: 8. Your Rights
sections.content:
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

â€¢ Right of access
â€¢ Right to rectification
â€¢ Right to deletion
â€¢ Right to data portability
â€¢ Right to object to certain processing activities

To exercise these rights, you can use Settings > Delete My Account in the app or email us at cyprurigo@gmail.com.

sections.title: 9. Childrenâ€™s Privacy
sections.content:
Cyprigo is not intended for children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13.

If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us personal data, please contact us at cyprurigo@gmail.com and we will delete such information promptly.

sections.title: 10. Third-Party Services
sections.content:
Our app uses third-party services such as:

â€¢ Supabase: Secure database and authentication services
â€¢ Apple App Store: In-app purchase processing
â€¢ Apple MapKit / Google Maps: Map and location services

These services have their own privacy policies. We recommend reviewing them.

sections.title: 11. Policy Changes
sections.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If there are material changes:

â€¢ We may notify you in the app
â€¢ We will publish the updated policy in the app
â€¢ We will update the "last updated" date

Your continued use of the app after changes means you accept the updated policy.

sections.title: 12. Contact
sections.content:
If you have questions, concerns, or requests about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, contact us:

Email: cyprurigo@gmail.com

Cyprigo
Northern Cyprus

Last updated: December 2025

terms.title: Community Guidelines
terms.guidelinesContent: Cyprigo is a community for travelers to share their experiences. To keep our community safe and welcoming, please follow these guidelines when posting content.
terms.noHateSpeech: Hate speech or discrimination of any kind
terms.noMisinformation: False or misleading content about places or services
terms.violationWarning: Violations may result in content removal and account suspension. We review all reports within 24 hours.

1.title: Create Your Route
1.description: Discover the most beautiful places, design your ideal route and enjoy a seamless travel experience.

2.title: Start Exploring
2.description: Ancient castles, pristine beaches and breathtaking views. Discover the treasures of North Cyprus.

3.title: Get More Done Together
3.description: Create personalized routes, save your favorites and share unforgettable memories with other travelers.
